get.description:
This service will return the count of all map grid cells that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

The result will be a single integer value.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species grid cells as array
get.description:
This service will return all map grid cell coordinates that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

Each record will be an array of two elements: longitude and latitude.

The service expects two required URL parameters:

- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species grid cells as GeoJSON points
get.description:
This service will return all map grid cell points that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

Each record will be a GeoJSON point object.

The service expects two required URL parameters:

- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species grid cells as GeoJSON polygons
get.description:
This service will return all map grid cell polygons that have species occurrence probabilities, regardless of period and future model scenario.

Each record will be a GeoJSON polygon object.

The service expects two required URL parameters:

- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species, period and scenario grid cells count
get.description:
This service will return the count of all map grid cells for a specific species, period and future scenario.

The service expects the following URL parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).

If the period is `cur2005`, the scenario will be ignored.

The result will be a single integer value.

parameters.name: scenario
parameters.description: Future model scenario, ignore for period `cur2005`.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species, period and scenario as array
get.description:
Given a species, a period and a model scenario, this service will return all the available grid cell coordinates, for the target species, the time period and the eventual future model scenario, as an array of three floating point values: longitude, latitude and occurrence probability in the range from 0 to 100.

The service expects the following parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record will be an array of three elements: longitude, latitude and occurrence probability in the range from 0 to 100.

parameters.name: scenario
parameters.description: Future period model scenario, ignored for current period (cur2005).

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.summary: Map species, period and scenario as GeoJSON points
get.description:
Given a species, a period and a model scenario, this service will return all the available grid points, for the target species, the time period and the eventual future model scenario, as a GeoJSON point object with the property 'value' in the range from 0 to 100.

The service expects the following parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record is a GeoJSON point object with its 'value' property corresponding to the species occurrence probability as a float value ranging from 0 to 100.

parameters.name: scenario
parameters.description: Future period model scenario, ignored for current period (cur2005).

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

The service expects the following parameters:

- `species`: Genus and species.
- `period`: The time period:
   - `cur2005`: Centered on 2005, current period.
   - `fut2035`: Future modeled period centered on 2035.
   - `fut2065`: Future modeled period centered on 2065.
   - `fut2095`: Future modeled period centered on 2095.
- `scenario`: Model scenario, only for future periods:
   - `rcp45`: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5 (RCP 4.5).
   - `rcp85`: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (RCP 8.5).
- `start`: First record index, zero-based.
- `limit`: Number of records to return.

Each record is a GeoJSON polygon object with its 'value' property corresponding to the species occurrence probability as a float value ranging from 0 to 100.

parameters.name: scenario
parameters.description: Future period model scenario, ignored for current period (cur2005).
